name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Pancetta, Parmesan Cheese, Black Pepper, Salt
instructions: Boil spaghetti. In a pan, cook pancetta. Beat eggs with cheese. Mix everything with pasta and season.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Fettuccine, Chicken Breast, Heavy Cream, Parmesan Cheese, Garlic, Butter, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken and garlic in butter. Add cream and cheese. Mix with pasta.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground Beef, Taco Shells, Onion, Garlic, Tomatoes, Lettuce, Cheese, Taco Seasoning
instructions: Cook beef with onion, garlic, and seasoning. Assemble tacos with toppings.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Broccoli, Carrot, Bell Peppers, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Tofu
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables and tofu in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

name: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: Salmon Fillet, Lemon, Garlic, Olive Oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Marinate salmon with lemon, garlic, and oil. Grill until cooked.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine Lettuce, Croutons, Parmesan Cheese, Caesar Dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.

name: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, Milk, Eggs, Baking Powder, Sugar, Butter
instructions: Mix ingredients. Cook pancakes on a skillet.

name: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza Dough, Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella, Basil
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, top with cheese and basil, bake.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Sauté shrimp with garlic and butter. Garnish with parsley and lemon.

name: Chili Con Carne
ingredients: Ground Beef, Beans, Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Chili Powder
instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic. Add tomatoes, beans, and spices. Simmer.

name: French Toast
ingredients: Bread, Eggs, Milk, Cinnamon, Sugar, Butter
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture. Cook on skillet with butter.

name: Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna Noodles, Ground Beef, Tomato Sauce, Ricotta Cheese, Mozzarella
instructions: Layer ingredients and bake until golden.

name: Beef Stew
ingredients: Beef, Carrots, Potatoes, Onion, Garlic, Beef Broth
instructions: Brown beef. Simmer with vegetables and broth.

name: Crispy Chicken Wings
ingredients: Chicken Wings, Flour, Salt, Pepper, Paprika
instructions: Coat wings in seasoned flour and bake or fry.

name: Miso Soup
ingredients: Miso Paste, Tofu, Seaweed, Green Onions
instructions: Dissolve miso paste in hot water. Add tofu and seaweed.

name: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: Rice, Eggs, Soy Sauce, Green Onions, Carrots
instructions: Stir-fry rice with eggs, vegetables, and soy sauce.

name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, Mozzarella, Basil, Olive Oil, Balsamic Vinegar
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Drizzle with oil and vinegar.

name: Baked Ziti
ingredients: Ziti Pasta, Tomato Sauce, Ricotta Cheese, Mozzarella
instructions: Mix pasta with sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

name: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: Bell Peppers, Ground Beef, Rice, Tomato Sauce
instructions: Stuff peppers with mixture and bake.
